Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using the Markdown format.
Here is the summary of the meeting:

Status on Merge: The merge status remains unchanged. There have been no new updates or changes to the timeline.

Devnet Status: Devnets for both Goerli and Sepolia testnets will be available soon, with a focus on testing the execution layer's functionality in these environments.

CL/EL Interoperability Testing: Progress has been made on CL/EL interoperability testing. The team is working towards completing this task by the end of Q2 2023.

Mainnet Merge Timeline: There are no updates to provide regarding the mainnet merge timeline, and it remains uncertain when exactly the merge will occur.
